Woe to you scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites: because you devour the houses of widows, praying long prayers. For this you shall receive the greater judgment.

\w Woe|strong="G3759"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, \w hypocrites|strong="G5273"\w*; \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* go round \w about|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w land|strong="G3584"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w proselyte|strong="G4339"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* child \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w hell|strong="G1067"\w* twofold more \w than|strong="G2532"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w*.
